SITE_COMMENT: Cu-contaminated river draining north to Trondheimfjord. Cu-sulfide ore mined between 1770-1919 at Muggruva mine. Located at Røros in Sør-Trøndelag, Central Norway. Fish caught some hundred meters downstream of water sample collection site. Location very approximate.

Cd/Zn-contaminated river draining south to Oslofjord. Contamination from Fjellsjøgruva Zn-blend ore mined 1953-1956. Located at Røros in Sør-Trøndelag, Central Norway. Fish caught at same location as water samples. Location very approximate.
